texts: You have no roads in your afterlife
You need roads for your SOULs to traverse around
A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A A
There are no gates in hell my liege
He's right SOULs need gates to travel into the afterlife
Start by placing down a gate in hell
You are not receiving any SOULs for heaven my lord
There are no gates for those SOULs to get here through
Place down a gate in heaven for them to get here
